title: Chiefs (Withdrawal of Recognition) (No. 3) Order, 2015
content:
31st July,2015 Statutory Instruments 175
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.52 OF2015
The Chiefs Act
(Laws,Volume16,Cap.287)
The Chiefs (Withdrawal of Recognition) (No. 3)
Order, 2015
WHEREAS the President is satisfied, after due inquiry, that the
personnamedintheScheduletothisOrderhasceasedtobeentitled
underAfrican CustomaryLaw tohold the office specified inthe
Schedule;
NOWTHEREFORE,inexerciseofthepowerscontainedinparagraph
(b)ofsubsection(1)ofsectionfouroftheChiefs Act,thefollowing
Orderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Chiefs (Withdrawal of Title
Recognition)(No.3)Order,2015.
2. TherecognitionaccordedundertheActtothepersonnamed Withdrawal
intheScheduleiswithdrawn. of
recognition
